CustomField.description: Created 10/15/2013 by H.Whitacre to support Coke decision to uniquely identify Account records by the combination of SAP ID and ACN#. Field will store both id's with vertical pipe in between, as <SAP_ID>|<ACN#>, for example "1000123|85999888".
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Unique external identifier for Account. Concatenate the SAP ID + vertical pipe+ ACN#. For example: "10002253|1035347". If either is blank, you must still supply the vertical pipe.
CustomField.label: SAP ACN Combined Id
